response.original_title: Breaking the Code: Behind the Walls of Chris Jericho
response.overview: For nearly twenty years, Chris Jericho has stolen the spotlight, becoming one of the most recognized Superstars in sports-entertainment history. Now fans can learn his entire life story, from childhood through his in-ring success internationally, ECW, WCW, and finally WWE, culminating in his becoming the first-ever Undisputed Champion.
response.title: Breaking the Code: Behind the Walls of Chris Jericho
